title: My Cute Baby Is A Wingman
summary: Top hacker An Jiujiu sneaks into an auction, intending to steal a gem, but unexpectedly loses her baby! Instead, there is a child who looks exactly like her son, only a bit dumb? When the little fox An Jiujiu meets the big black wolf Ji Jinchen, she hides from him, but he still catches her firmly. Since we can't escape, we'll train him to be a good dog, and what's the fate of marriage, we already have two children!

title: Monday to Weekend
summary:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

title: The New Employee Chairman Kang
summary:
I’m Kang Yong-ho, the Chairman of Choi Sung Group, one of South Korea’s top 10 conglomerates.
Just when I was basking in the glory of my retirement declaration, out of the blue, a new employee fell from the sky and landed on my head. But hey, where’d my body go, and now I’ve turned into a new Employee?!

“What’s this? Are you telling me to start with Excel or something?

title: The Revenge of the Abandoned Daughter of a Prestigious Magic Family
summary:
“Lucia, I can't express how thankful I am that you're here.”

The most powerful mage family in the empire, the Rodbell family. And beneath that glorious name lies the family’s disgrace, the half-blood Rodbell.

“I’m really glad you're my daughter.”

I’ve endured all kinds of contempt and worked hard just to hear these words. For my entire life, craving affection, my father smiled for the first time and said to me, “With your lowly body, Rodbell will enjoy its golden age for the next hundred years. Be proud.”

The Abyss (Abyssus), a bottomless pit, so deep and wide that the end is invisible, where the Evil God is sealed. To maintain its power, once every hundred years, Rodbell’s bloodline must be sacrificed there.

‘I can't die like this.’

I couldn’t let my death be used and discarded for them. As they were all distracted, I tried to escape.

‘Goodbye. Foolish, dumb Lucia.’

With an angelic smile and the most dreadful malice, I fell into hell.

──────────

[Something interesting has fallen.]

In the endless darkness, a soft voice filled with laughter approached like salvation.

“I’ll help you.”

With an irresistible sweet proposal.

“How about this time, you make them fall into the abyss?”

──────────

I returned to the past.

I was about to leave after achieving everything I wanted.

“I’ll give Rodbell to you. I’ll give you whatever you desire. So…”

Why you?

The one who hated me the most.

“Don’t leave, Lucia.”

Why are you clinging to me?

title: The more I die, the more invincible I become.
summary:
Summoned into a world where the divine and martial arts coexisted, Qiao Mu can revive infinitely and level up.
The more tragic his death, the stronger he becomes after he is revived. The enemies are shocked to realize after defeating a young man an older man shows up, repeating infinitely!
Rumors started to spread about a legendary Qiao family… Wait, no one told me that reviving makes me older!

Other Official:
[AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/655874), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc36073)

title: The Reincarnated Assassin is a Genius Swordsman
summary:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?

title: A Savage Proposal
summary: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Even if the Villain’s Daughter Regresses
summary:
A man invades her home, asking, “Are you Laila Hildegard?” Though her father’s sins sealed her fate, Laila swallows a ‘stone of return’ to escape death, reverting to age ten. Yet, the man continues to pursue her, leading to endless cycles of death. But this time, something changes. “Why did you save me?” Laila asks, to which the man quietly replies, “Because I’m insane.”

---
How would you win over an enemy who just won't stop killing you? Laila thought she had escaped death by figuring out how to turn back time, but her assassin finds her again... and again... and again! All because her sadistic villain of a father had to murder his entire family... When all her evasion plans fail, there's only one option left: coddle her enemy through his childhood and hope he'll spare her when he comes back to exact his revenge. But why is this wacko so pigheaded?!

title: How to Retire as a Disaster Necromancer
F-Class Destiny Hunter
summary:
In a world of abilities known as fortunes, Seo Gangrim brings misfortune to those around him. Despite his low rank, people fear his power to steal fortunes from the dead.

After his entire sect is annihilated by an assassin, Gangrim returns to the past, desperate to prevent its grisly end. He intends to make a difference this time but realizes that even fortunes aren't set in stone.

Will Gangrim be able to save his comrades from their unjust deaths, or will he only bring doom to them all again?

title: I’ll Take On This Marriage In This Life
summary:
After a hazy one-night encounter, Sayna found herself married to George. The end of that hellish marriage? Death. But then, she woke up—summoned back by her twin brother Yuri. Now, she’s returned to her youthful days at nineteen, before everything fell apart! Determined to live differently this time, she swore off marriage entirely. That is… until: "I want to be that man for you." Duke Constantine proposes to her?!

---
Adored by her noble family, Saina Devof had a perfect life until one night ruined her societal debut, her family’s honor, and her future in one fell swoop. Determined to fix her mistake, she chooses to marry the man from that night, only to find herself trapped in a nightmare that ended with her lonely death. Then, she woke up. 18 years old again with a second chance at life, Saina swears off marriage for good. But her plans change when he appears:

“I want to be your choice.”

Enter Duke Constantine—the man determined to rewrite her destiny.

title: My Wife Appeared at My Wife’s Funeral
A Snake Lives in the Empress’s Bedroom
summary: A deposed empress, stripped of her family and status by her paranoid emperor husband, plots revenge. She strategically allies with a charismatic war hero, expecting a mere partnership—but his growing fascination with her strength and vulnerability complicates her plans.

title: The Price Is Your Everything
summary: Transported back to her first academy days, Nerys Truydd revisits a life marred by betrayal and torment. Exploited and poisoned by her own family and husband, her demise was met with a vow to curse those who wronged her. Now granted a second chance, Nerys vows to rewrite her fate. As she navigates her past, memories of those who hurt her flood back. Determined and fueled by retribution, she seeks to reclaim all she lost. Can she overturn her tragic past and emerge victorious from the shadows of her betrayal?

title: The Saintess Returns as a Villain
summary: Beatrice has lived as a saint for 10 years to prevent the disaster of the empire and win the love of her family. One day, her place as a saint was taken away by a girl named Lina Cumbell with her black hair... “I will kill you, your family, and all your followers.” She is framed as a warlock and executed. Beatrice's second life began like that. “Even if this life becomes a villainess… Lina, I will avenge you!!” The new life of Riche, a true saint who decided to become a villain, is redrawn.

title: The Ugly Wife of the Shady Duke
summary: Reincarnated as the neglected wife of a duke who secretly loves the novel's heroine, she plans to divorce him to survive. Yet, he desperately begs her not to leave, confusing her as the story unfolds differently than she remembered.

title: Death Penalty
summary:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

title: Blade of Retribution
summary: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.

title: The Great War
summary:
Im Dajun, who was abandoned by his family and now lives as the leader of a runaway group, one day brings Yeonwoo home by chance. Yeonwoo then commits a violent rampage in Incheon. Standing in the way of Yeonwoo, who was trying to kill a chaebol chairman for revenge, is Yoon Gamin, a top student hopeful. Meanwhile, Nahwajin of the School Authority Protection Bureau watches the situation with interest...

The first crossover in the Blue String Universe! A massive showdown featuring the main characters from [True Education], [Study Group], and [How to Fight]. This is a record of an intense battle not covered in their own stories.

title: Beneath the Peach Tree
summary:
1. The Conditions for Paradise  
Two adult women figuring out the boundaries in their relationship–is too much freedom a bad thing?  
  
2. Beyond the Stars  
Chapter 1 prequel. It's about how Sarina and Sumi first became more than friends.  
  
3. Bathed in Sunlight Filtering Through the Trees  
A continuation of Sarina and Sumi's relationship.  
  
4. 20-Year-Old Girl x 30-Year-Old Maiden  
About an art prep school teacher who feels like she can't compare to her new 20-year-old girlfriend.  
  
5. The Opposite of "Seme" is "Protector"  
Chapter 4 sequel. Keiko wants to take things further. There are two more stories in this series in the A Lapis Lazuli Blue Dream collection.  
  
6. We're Aiming for Love Now  
It's about two women who love each other just as they are.  
  
7. Peach Taste  
A girl struggles to convince the object of her affections to take her seriously.  
  
8. Princess Sakura, Showered With Blossoms  
Set in Japan's past. A knight protects her princess.

title: The Villainess Is Shy In Receiving Love
summary:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)

title: The Cruelty of Salvation
summary:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…

title: Gold Queen
summary: I'm Teru! Just your wee lil' horny high school girl who's trying to become a mangaka! One day, while I was lost in my sexual fantasies, I got hit by a truck and was reincarnated into an isekai! Though I became a slave of the beautiful elf queen, Sirius, I've got a wholesome orc as my roommate, and there's cute elves all around, so I have to say I'm having a pretty time!

title: My Body Has Been Possessed By Someone
summary: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: Miss Pendleton
summary: If love is the ultimate prize, then the perils of courtship are the necessary trials and tribulations one must endure in its pursuit. It is a blessing for the society debutantes of London, then, that Cupid’s arrow should be guided by the dainty hand of Miss Laura Pendleton, granddaughter of Countess Pendleton and the city’s finest matchmaker. When Laura’s self-ascribed duties call her to befriend the stoic and saturnine Mr. Ian Dalton of Whitefield, however, she soon finds that when it comes to the grand contest of love, it may well be every woman for herself…

title: Marquis of Marron
summary:
I ended up possessing the body of Hailey, a villainess who was destined to die soon.

What’s relatively fortunate, if you can call it that, is that she has one more year to live. However, there’s no time to relax as she’s unceremoniously dumped into a contaminated region below a canyon.

“I’m a possessor!

But wasn’t she supposed to die?

“Do you understand? If you cling to the past, you’ll twist your future into something you can’t recognize. That’s the wisdom left behind by the ancient sages.”

A year later, I’m still alive and farming.

Hailey, who I thought was just an ordinary (?) witch, was actually a genius.

She could control magic and she could purify zombies.

With talents too precious to waste, I decided to work a little harder:

“How much would it cost to buy everything you have?”

“Ah, uhmm, please let me live.”

During this time, I gained the nickname “Devil Marquess”. and started to attract beggars who regarded me like a child they could use:

“I’m not leaving!”

“Why not? Why on earth not?”

“We want to live by your grace, milady!”

I’m a devil marquess, so why aren’t you scared of me!

title: The Substitute Saintess is Doted on by the Enemy Crown Prince’s Kiss
Didn’t We Agree To Have Pure Love?
summary:
When the sadistic heroine travels through time and space to the body of the puppet princess of a fallen nation in a 18+ novel... Can she keep herself unscathed in a den teeming with hungry wolves?

"Wait... Didn't they say this is a pure love story? Why are there so many perverted male protagonists?!"

title: Part-Time Couple
It’s My First Time Being a Mother Again
summary:
"Please place your seal here, Lady Grint."

"No!"

"Don’t make this harder than it needs to be. Just do it." 

"I said no! Why on earth would I marry you?"

"Then who would you marry, my lady?"

At a distance close enough to feel each other’s breath, Therious Hurt gently raised his index finger and began tracing soft circles over my flat belly. My body stiffened at the strange, indescribable sensation.

"My child is right here. Who do you think you’re marrying if not me?" 

I got dumped by the man I’d loved for 10 years, and in a fit of anger... I slept with his superior!
It was fine up to that point, but what am I supposed to do now?!

title: Barbarian’s Adventure in a Fantasy World
summary:
An unfortunate girl living in modern times travels to another world and by chance, receives an amazing power. She is able to attract the hearts of many and captures the hearts of the four Crown Princes from four different countries. As she travels down this path, will she be able to succeed in becoming the master of an imperial harem?

---

[Official English PV](https://youtu.be/Ocf8OLuvA0Y)  
Official English: [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f2bd9208c252b04ca6bb0ea), [MangaToon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/detail/599377),  [Pocket Comics](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: Reincarnation of the Martial God
summary:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6325420), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=774044)

title: The Luoyang Branch of the Heavenly Demon Cult
summary: What does "Mu" (武) in martial hero (武俠) mean? It is the power to enforce one's own sense of justice (俠). If that power extends beyond oneself, through others, and reaches the ends of the world, then that is the realm of the divine (神). What does a mere human need to ascend to godhood (入神)? Now begins the epic of Pi Wolryeo in search of that answer!

title: I Mistook the Hidden Identity of the Sub Male Lead
summary:
Mary Siringa has finally realized the error of her ways as a spoiled burden to her family. In her search for a job, she runs into Prince Grandiel, disguised as his alter ego, Nepenthes. Intrigued by Mary, Grandiel draws up a magical contract for her to be a maid in the imperial palace and work as his spy. Now, Mary must protect Grandiel's secret identity and comply with the other clauses of her contract, or else her heart will explode! Can Mary keep her true self hidden, or will she die trying?

---
**Official Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EC%B2%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B4-%EC%84%9C%EB%B8%8C%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%97%90%EA%B2%8C-%EC%9E%98%EB%AA%BB-%EA%B1%B8%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/3147), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55798486)

* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Dealing-with-the-Secretive-Male-Second-Lead/643)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/133859)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%8B%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7/608)

title: Picking Up a Suspicious Husband
summary:
Deep in the remote countryside, where the locals claim "a woman’s happiness lies in marriage," a suspiciously handsome man suddenly appears—the same one I recently found wandering near my vegetable patch.

And now, he’s introducing himself as my husband…

But every time...

title: The World’s Best Engineer
summary:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?

title: Absolute Necromancer
summary:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!

title: Solo Max-Level Newbie
summary:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: A Regressor’s Tale of Cultivation
summary:
Devoid of any talent, I met my end after suffering at rock bottom for many years.

That was my first life... and the start of my endless regressions.

title: Return of the Mad Demon
summary: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...?

title: ??? Rank no Ura Soubi Musou
summary: What would you do if you suddenly regained memories of your past life and realized you were living in a world that was once a game you played? Jinfrey chooses to use his knowledge as an OG gamer and exploit the game’s secrets so he can become an unparalleled adventurer. But he’ll have to be careful because if he dies, it’s game over! Will he be able to find all of the hidden rank equipment, defeat the bosses, and give his family the life they deserve?

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
summary: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.

title: I’ll Resign And Have A Fresh Start In This World
summary:
The main character, Cho Isu, lived an ordinary but happy life.
Five years ago, he suddenly loses his parents, and becomes a devastated man, as he struggles every day.
When he was exhausted from the suffocating daily life, a portal opened in the room. A place he has never been to, a place he doesn’t know what might be.
A healing life to enjoy in a different world starting as a commoner and turning into a feudal lord.

title: After Rebirth, I Used Mirror Reversal For Vengeance
Return of the Bloodthirsty Police
summary: "Bo Sal, a monk at the Hwaguksa Buddhist temple and head of the Hwaguksa hitman group, picked up Bi Gwang as a child and raised him as a hitman. When Bi Gwang grew tired of the killing and decided to leave the group to start living a normal life, Bo Sal and the other members of the Hwaguksa group betrayed and killed him. After his death, Bi Gwang's soul was transferred into the body of a police officer named Kim Gyeongsu and he vowed to take revenge on the Hwaguksa group for their betrayal." [MU]

title: Admission is a Waste of Time
summary:
How about a university where you attend classes at the Tower of Babel? 

Ban Yoo-won possesses the extraordinary ability not only to interpret unknown languages but also to see and absorb "concepts" from the things he observes. 

Since childhood, Yoo-won’s grandfather has told him: "Our family descends from the ancestor who led people to build the Tower of Babel with the power to make everyone communicate. With that same inherited power, you will be able to reclaim the lost Tower of Babel." 

At first, Yoo-won thought it was just a far-fetched story. But while waiting for his university acceptance results, he is suddenly summoned to an academy from an unknown dimension. There, he witnesses the legendary Tower of Babel, which he had only heard about in stories. 

Driven by a somewhat materialistic desire to reclaim his family’s lost building and become its owner, along with a sincere wish to fulfill a long-standing family dream, Yoo-won enters the academy. 

Finally, he begins his climb up the Tower of Babel — a dungeon filled with dangers and monsters, where the power of constellations and, at its peak, the power of the gods, awaits him!

title: Shut up, Evil Dragon, I don’t want to raise a child with you anymore
summary:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: The End of a Fake Marriage
summary: When Miyagi, the head of a well-established Japanese restaurant, is confessed to by Kasuga, a chef-in-training visiting from a sister restaurant, the next day and every day after invites continuous sexual advances! Even as he struggles to resist Kasuga's proposals, what will happen as Miyagi becomes moved by Kasuga's unwavering attempts?!
